thread.title: Location is perfect!
thread.title_full: Location is perfect! - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: formerexpatCT
title: Location is perfect!
text: Steps from Fifth Avenue, this hotel is walkable to tons of restaurants, attractions and subways. The room was nicely furnished and quiet considering its location. I did think the bed could use replacement. Front desk personnel were friendly and extremely helpful. The hotel really has no lobby to speak of and the breakfast area is inadequate at best but if you can get past that, this is a great option for a midtown hotel.
